元认知和流行病：我们的信念如何影响我们的选择在 2019 年冠状病毒病 (COVID-19) 大流行期间自我反思自己的信仰和行为的能力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231023/Metacognition-and-the-pandemic-how-our-beliefs-influence-our-choices.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231023/Metacognition-and-the-pandemic-how-our-beliefs-influence-our-choices.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=53fcd48e-e331-4b90-8424-7f0781fff341 Mon, 23 Oct 2023 07:19:00 -0400 Metacognition and the pandemic: how our beliefs influence our choices
草莓可以降低阿尔茨海默病的风险吗？最近的研究表明了一种可能性草莓补充剂是否可以降低晚年痴呆症的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231023/Can-strawberry-mitigate-Alzheimers-risk-Recent-study-suggests-a-possibility.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231023/Can-strawberry-mitigate-Alzheimers-risk-Recent-study-suggests-a-possibility.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=51cc3a5a-abbe-43dd-af8a-d7366b509dd8 Mon, 23 Oct 2023 06:40:00 -0400 Can strawberries mitigate Alzheimer's risk? Recent study suggests a possibility
DeNovix CellDrop 成为首个获得 ACT® Label 认证的自动细胞计数器DeNovix CellDrop™ 自动细胞计数器已获得 My Green Lab® 的 ACT® 标签认证，使其成为第一款获得该计划认可的自动细胞计数器。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231023/DeNovix-CellDrop-Becomes-First-ACTc2ae-Label-Certified-Automated-Cell-Counter.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231023/DeNovix-CellDrop-Becomes-First-ACTc2ae-Label-Certified-Automated-Cell-Counter.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5995f4df-56c2-45a6-8697-b8ca6fed5afe Mon, 23 Oct 2023 04:41:00 -0400 DeNovix CellDrop Becomes First ACT® Label Certified Automated Cell Counter
香港拒绝接种 COVID-19 疫苗的原因是什么？香港接受 2019 年冠状病毒病 (COVID-19) 疫苗的意愿以及犹豫的原因。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231023/What-were-the-reasons-for-COVID-19-vaccine-refusal-in-Hong-Kong.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231023/What-were-the-reasons-for-COVID-19-vaccine-refusal-in-Hong-Kong.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=829b26ae-764a-4c2d-8d57-f0e1d6b7cdea Mon, 23 Oct 2023 03:49:00 -0400 What were the reasons for COVID-19 vaccine refusal in Hong Kong?
SARS-CoV-2 在医护人员中的传播动态SARS-CoV-2 在医院中的传播及其对 COVID-19 大流行动态的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231023/The-transmission-dynamics-of-SARS-CoV-2-among-healthcare-workers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231023/The-transmission-dynamics-of-SARS-CoV-2-among-healthcare-workers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=da38fcdd-b4f3-4f50-8471-573ee097781d Mon, 23 Oct 2023 00:09:00 -0400 The transmission dynamics of SARS-CoV-2 among healthcare workers
化疗加免疫治疗可提高转移性​​尿路上皮癌患者的生存率由西奈山研究人员共同领导的一项临床试验首次表明，化疗联合免疫疗法可提高晚期膀胱癌患者的生存率。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231022/Chemotherapy-plus-immunotherapy-improves-survival-in-病人-with-metastatic-urothelial-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231022/Chemotherapy-plus-immunotherapy-improves-survival-in-病人-with-metastatic-urothelial-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=662728c2-07c6-41f3-9e9e-89f5a5d3578c Sun, 22 Oct 2023 23:22:02 -0400 Chemotherapy plus immunotherapy improves survival in patients with metastatic urothelial cancer
围手术期免疫治疗可改善可切除早期肺癌的无事件生存期与单独的术前（新辅助）化疗相比，在手术前后添加围手术期免疫治疗可显着改善可切除早期非小细胞肺癌（NSCLC）患者的无事件生存期（EFS）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231022/Perioperative-immunotherapy-improves-event-free-survival-in-resectable-early-stage-lung-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231022/Perioperative-immunotherapy-improves-event-free-survival-in-resectable-early-stage-lung-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dd0dfe11-8e10-4bec-89d2-670203c63612 Sun, 22 Oct 2023 23:13:20 -0400 Perioperative immunotherapy improves event-free survival in resectable early-stage lung cancer
短疗程诱导化疗可使宫颈癌复发和死亡降低35%由英国癌症研究中心和伦敦大学学院癌症试验中心资助的 INTERLACE III 期试验评估了放化疗 (CRT) 之前的短期诱导化疗 (IC) 是否可以降低局部晚期宫颈癌患者的复发率和死亡率。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231022/Short-course-of-induction-chemotherapy-can-reduce-cervical-cancer-relapse-and-death-by-3525.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231022/Short-course-of-induction-chemotherapy-can-reduce-cervical-cancer-relapse-and-death-by-3525.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=17928f5f-16ff-4dd1-9687-0a37406938f1 Sun, 22 Oct 2023 22:51:25 -0400 Short course of induction chemotherapy can reduce cervical cancer relapse and death by 35%
双作用药物产品在神经内分泌肿瘤试验中显示出有希望的结果丹纳法伯癌症研究所研究人员领导的一项研究表明，一种同时攻击癌细胞生长回路和通向血液的管道的药物在一项涉及晚期神经内分泌肿瘤患者的临床试验中产生了令人鼓舞的结果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231022/Dual-action-drug-products-shows-promising-results-in-neuroendocrine-tumor-trial.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231022/Dual-action-drug-products-shows-promising-results-in-neuroendocrine-tumor-trial.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3d6e0f8b-0249-4e37-8e87-00d41df103eb Sun, 22 Oct 2023 22:36:59 -0400 Dual-action drug produces shows promising results in neuroendocrine tumor trial
新研究揭示了氯胺酮的持久抗抑郁作用持续阻断 NMDAR 和外侧缰核 (LHb) 神经元的爆发型放电可能为氯胺酮的持久抗抑郁作用提供基础。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231022/Ketamines-long-having-antidepressant-effects-unveiled-in-new-study.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231022/Ketamines-long-having-antidepressant-effects-unveiled-in-new-study.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e4981529-124b-477d-b6bd-ba19b69989eb Sun, 22 Oct 2023 22:34:00 -0400 Ketamine's long-lasting antidepressant effects unveiled in new study
